content:
No need to worry about the previous response! I'm here to help and provide guidance.

Your concise and neutral response is perfect, and you've provided some great suggestions for establishing a consistent morning routine.

To help you better, I'll respond as if I'm the one struggling with my morning routine.

"I'm having trouble waking up at 7:00 am consistently. I often hit the snooze button and end up waking up later than I want to. I'm not a morning person, and I find it hard to get out of bed. Do you have any tips on how to overcome this?"

Please feel free to respond and offer guidance!
